routes.content:
# Express with TypeScript

## Prerequisites
- Node.js v14+
- npm or yarn

## Setup Steps
1. Initialize project: `npm init -y`
2. Install dependencies: `npm install express typescript ts-node @types/express`
3. Create tsconfig.json
4. Create src directory and app.ts

## Sample Code
```typescript
import express from 'express';
const app = express();
app.get('/', (req, res) => res.send('Hello TypeScript!'));
app.listen(3000, () => console.log('Server running'));
```
routes.description: Step-by-step guide to setting up an Express.js server with TypeScript
routes.title: Setting Up Express with TypeScript
